plot: Dalton Anderson has always had a fascination with love. He strives to find it throughout all the stages of his life, and he continues to search for it even in the darkest of times.
title: The Most Beautiful Girl in the World
plot_es: Dalton Anderson has always had a fascination with love. He strives to find it throughout all the stages of his life, and he continues to search for it even in the darkest of times.
original_name: The Most Beautiful Girl in the World
plot_en: Dalton Anderson has always had a fascination with love. He strives to find it throughout all the stages of his life, and he continues to search for it even in the darkest of times.
